block.p: Lindsay Love Dwyer and Daniel Michael Holland were married yesterday in New Canaan, Conn., where their parents, Paula and Stephen Dwyer and Louise and Michael Holland, live. The Rev. Kevin Royal performed the ceremony at St. Aloysius Roman Catholic Church.

Mrs. Holland, 24, is a media planner in New York for Cossette Post, a Canadian advertising agency. She graduated from Boston College. Her father is a furniture manufacturer's representative in New Canaan. Her mother is a designer for Country Design, an interiors company there.

Lindsay Dwyer, Daniel Holland Lindsay Love Dwyer and Daniel Michael Holland were married yesterday in New Canaan, Conn., where their parents, Paula and Stephen Dwyer and Louise and Michael Holland, live. The Rev. KevinRoyal performed the ceremony at St. Aloysius Roman Catholic Church.

Lindsay Love Dwyer and Daniel Michael Holland were married yesterday in New Canaan, Conn., where their parents, Paula and Stephen Dwyer and Louise and Michael Holland, live. The Rev. Kevin Royal performed the ceremony at St. Aloysius Roman Catholic Church.

Mrs. Holland, 24, is a media planner in New York for Cossette Post, a Canadian advertising agency. She graduated from Boston College. Her father is a furniture manufacturer's representative in New Canaan. Her mother is a designer for Country Design, an interiors company there.

Mr. Holland, 27, worked until last month at St. Luke's School in New Canaan, where he taught fifth grade and coached boys' basketball and lacrosse. In August, he is to begin studying at New York Law School. He graduated from Vanderbilt. His father is the president of Holland & Company, a money management concern in New York.
